definition.name: Lint Action
definition.description: GitHub Action for detecting and fixing linting errors
definition.author: Samuel Meuli

inputs.name: github_token
inputs.description: The GitHub token used to authenticated with GitHub.

inputs.name: continue_on_error
inputs.description: Whether the workflow run should also fail when linter failures are detected

inputs.name: auto_fix
inputs.description: Whether linters should try to fix code style issues automatically

inputs.name: commit
inputs.description: Whether to commit and push the changes made by auto_fix

inputs.name: git_no_verify
inputs.description: Bypass the pre-commit and pre-push git hooks

inputs.name: git_name
inputs.description: Username for auto-fix commits

inputs.name: git_email
inputs.description: Email address for auto-fix commits

inputs.name: commit_message
inputs.description: Template for auto-fix commit messages. The "${linter}" variable can be used to insert the name of the linter which has created the auto-fix

inputs.name: check_name
inputs.description: Template for the name of the check run. The "${linter}" and "${dir}" variables can be used to insert the name and directory of the linter.

inputs.name: neutral_check_on_warning
inputs.description: Whether the check run should conclude with a neutral status instead of success when the linter finds only warnings

inputs.name: stylelint
inputs.description: Enable or disable stylelint checks

inputs.name: stylelint_args
inputs.description: Additional arguments to pass to the linter

inputs.name: stylelint_dir
inputs.description: Directory where the stylelint command should be run

inputs.name: stylelint_extensions
inputs.description: Extensions of files to check with stylelint

inputs.name: stylelint_command_prefix
inputs.description: Shell command to prepend to the linter command

inputs.name: stylelint_auto_fix
inputs.description: Whether this linter should try to fix code style issues automatically. If set to `true`, it will only work if "auto_fix" is set to `true` as well

inputs.description: Enable or disable gofmt checks
